articles.title: India-Canada row: How ties hit rock bottom between the two countries - BBC.com
articles.description: India and Canada expelled diplomats as tensions rose over last year's killing of a Sikh separatist in Canada.
articles.content:
Indian PM Narendra Modi (right) shakes hand with Canada's Justin Trudeau ahead of the G20 summit in September 2023
